column2:
```r
allrank %>% 
  # mutate(oldrank = lbtsyd1$oldrank[.match(SA2, lbtsyd1$SA2)]) %>% 
  rowwise() %>% 
  # mutate(total = mean(c(oldrank, a.shops, a.hospitals, a.schools, a.transit, a.work), na.rm=T)) %>% 
  mutate(local = mean(c(a.shops, a.hospitals, a.schools, a.transit), na.rm=T)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(`30-min city index` = min_rank(total)) %>% 
  mutate(`Local accessibility` = min_rank(local)) %>% 
  mutate(`Work accessibility` = a.work) %>% 
  select(SA2, `30-min city index`, `Local accessibility`, `Work accessibility`) %>% 
  arrange(`30-min city index`) %>% 
  .[1:50,] %>% 
  copy.table()
```
